snippet: That move, along with a sharp increase in announced layoffs, suggested some loss of momentum in the labor market during a sharp economic slowdown and stock market sell-off.
abstract: Labor Dept reports weekly claims for state unemployment benefits rose 8,000 to seasonally adjusted 285,000; Challenger, Gray & Christmas report 75,114 layoffs by employers for January, up from 23,622 in December.
lead_paragraph: That move, along with a sharp increase in announced layoffs, suggested some loss of momentum in the labor market during a sharp economic slowdown and stock market sell-off.

headline.main: Number of Jobless Claims Rises More Than Expected
headline.print_headline: Jobless Claims Tick Up, and Plans for Layoffs Rise
